author: maxb
msg: Document Neon's --with-ssl in our own "configure --help", because users keep
missing that they probably want to specify this.
* configure.in: Add a new AC_ARG_WITH([ssl], ...) stanza.

author: sussman
msg: We're doing this because the fixing of issue #2144 causes issue #2148
to be revealed, which is far nastier.  Issue #2148 isn't likely to be fixed
anytime soon;  it has its own branch, and requires a wc-format
Therefore, both issues #2144 and #2148 need to be fixed as a pair, and
are currently assigned to the 1.3 release.  See the issues for details.

author: maxb
msg: Fix some code style whilst working here.
